I bought the grey skeleton print. I noticed most people's reviews are for other shirts/designs and they complained about the fabric being too thin and costume-like. This wasn't the case for the grey one. The material is polyester, it's a little thicker and warmer than I expected and I found it to be comfortable and stylish.
